contact.title: Contact With Me
contact.description: Get in touch with us. We're here to listen, collaborate, and turn your ideas into reality.
contact.submit: Your message send successfully, thanks for reaching out!
contact.submitFail: Your message couldn't send succesfully, please try again later.

footer.title: Unleash the Power of Web Innovation
footer.description: We're your trusted partner in web development. Our mission is to bring your digital dreams to life. Let's create something amazing together!

cookies.title: We Don't Track Your Data
cookies.description:
We only use cookies to remember your language and theme preferences. No analytics, no tracking, no ads.
For more information, please review our [Cookie Policy](/policies/cookie-policy) and [Privacy Policy](/policies/terms-of-privacy).

notFound.title: 404 - Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for could not be found. You are being redirected to the homepage...
notFound.info: Smoking also kills. No animals were harmed during the making and publication of this site. CrunchyPix does not endorse, recommend, or encourage the consumption of cigarettes.
